page.prototype: SQL::LocalDB::GetInstanceInfo as P (InstanceName as C, Info as SQL::LocalDBInstanceInfo)

argument.name: InstanceName
argument.description: The name of the SQLLocalDB instance to get information for.

argument.name: Info
argument.description: A SQL::LocalDBInstanceInfo object that will be populated with the instance information.

page.description: Gets information about the specified instance of SQLLocalDB. See example.
page.example:
dim InstanceInfo as sql::LocalDBInstanceInfo r = sql::Localdb::GetInstanceInfo("MSSQLLocalDB", InstanceInfo) ?r.text = "Success"
?InstanceInfo = P Clone() 'Create a copy of an object instance. P NewInstance() 'Create a new object instance of the same type. Build = 2269 ConfigurationIsCorrupted = .F. InstanceFilesExistOnDisk = .T. IsAutomatic = .T. IsRunning = .F. IsShared = .F.
